abstract.t: This memo describes a proposed protocol for locating and connecting users together on an internet. In the last year, there has been an explosion in the number of client applications on the Internet that communicate directly with another client or clients. These applications include internet 'telephones', video phones, whiteboards, and other conferencing applications. Each of these applications uses a proprietary or ad-hoc solution for providing a directory of currently connected users and performing name to address mapping.
